sqlMap.statement:
TRUNCATE TABLE
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN_LOG
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN_LOG
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN

INSERT INTO TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN_LOG (
INSERT INTO TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN_LOG (
EZTABLEID ,EZCANCELFLAG ,EZINTIME ,EZINTIMEZONE ,EZINCOMPANYCODE ,EZINUSERID ,EZINAPLID ,EZUPTIME ,EZUPTIMEZONE ,EZUPCOMPANYCODE ,EZUPUSERID ,EZUPAPLID ,GLBL_CMPY_CD ,TRTY_RULE_PK ,DS_ACCT_NUM ,LOC_NUM ,DS_ACCT_NM ,DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,TRTY_TP_CD ,TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,ORG_RANK_NUM ,ORG_CD ,PTY_LOC_PK ) SELECT
'TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN_LOG' EZTABLEID
'TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN_LOG' EZTABLEID
, '0' EZCANCELFLAG , #ezintime# EZINTIME , #ezintimezone# EZINTIMEZONE , #ezincompanycode# EZINCOMPANYCODE , #ezinuserid# EZINUSERID , #ezinaplid# EZINAPLID , #ezuptime# EZUPTIME , #ezuptimezone# EZUPTIMEZONE , #ezupcompanycode# EZUPCOMPANYCODE , #ezupuserid# EZUPUSERID , #ezupaplid# EZUPAPLID , #glblCmpyCd# GLBL_CMPY_CD , TBL.TRTY_RULE_PK , TBL.DS_ACCT_NUM , TBL.LOC_NUM , TBL.DS_ACCT_NM , TBL.DS_ACCT_TP_CD , TBL.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , TBL.TRTY_TP_CD , TBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , TBL.ORG_RANK_NUM , TBL.ORG_CD , TBL.PTY_LOC_PK FROM
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN TBL
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN TBL
WHERE TBL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TBL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY TBL.LOC_NUM ASC , TBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ASC , TBL.ORG_RANK_NUM ASC

INSERT INTO TRTY_RULE_WRK
INSERT INTO TRTY_RULE_PROS_WRK
SELECT DISTINCT #tableId# EZTABLEID , '0' EZCANCELFLAG , #ezintime# EZINTIME , #ezintimezone# EZINTIMEZONE , #ezincompanycode# EZINCOMPANYCODE , #ezinuserid# EZINUSERID , #ezinaplid# EZINAPLID , #ezuptime# EZUPTIME , #ezuptimezone# EZUPTIMEZONE , #ezupcompanycode# EZUPCOMPANYCODE , #ezupuserid# EZUPUSERID , #ezupaplid# EZUPAPLID , #glblCmpyCd# GLBL_CMPY_CD
, TR.TRTY_RULE_PK TRTY_RULE_PK , TR.ORG_CD ORG_CD , TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD TRTY_RULE_TP_CD , TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT , TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT , TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD , TR.TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD , DOU.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , DOU.TRTY_TP_CD TRTY_TP_CD FROM TRTY_RULE TR , TRTY_RULE_TP TRP , DS_ORG_UNIT DOU , TRTY_TP TT WHERE TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TR.EFF_FROM_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (TR.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL OR TR.EFF_THRU_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD'))
AND TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD = #trtyRuleTpCd# AND TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD = #trtyRuleOprdTpCd#
AND TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD = TRP.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD
AND TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOU.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DOU.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TR.ORG_CD = DOU.ORG_CD AND DOU.GNRN_TP_CD IN(#gnrnTpCurrent#, #gnrnTpFuture#)
AND DOU.EFF_FROM_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( DOU.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL OR DOU.EFF_THRU_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') )
AND DOU.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DOU.TRTY_TP_CD = TT.TRTY_TP_CD AND TT.DEF_SLS_REP_BAT_FLG = #defSlsRepBatFlg#
AND TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD = #trtyRuleLogicTpCdOr#

SELECT ORG_CD AS ORG_CD ,MIN(TRTY_RULE_PK) AS TRTY_RULE_PK ,MIN(TRTY_GRP_TP_CD) AS TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,MIN(TRTY_TP_CD) AS TRTY_TP_CD
,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_STATE) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_STATE ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_STATE) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_STATE ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_STATE) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_STATE ,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_POSTAL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_POSTAL ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_POSTAL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_POSTAL ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_POSTAL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_POSTAL
,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_NUM) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_NUM ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM
,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_LOC_NUM) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_LOC_NUM ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM ,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_CLS) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_CLS ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS ,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_CUSTGRP) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_CUSTGRP ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP ,MIN(TR_OPRD_TP_CD_SIC) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_SIC ,MIN(TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_SIC) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_SIC ,MIN(TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_SIC) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_SIC FROM ( SELECT TR.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD , TR.TRTY_RULE_PK AS TRTY_RULE_PK , DOU.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD AS TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , DOU.TRTY_TP_CD AS TRTY_TP_CD
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#state#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_STATE , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#state#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_STATE , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#state#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_STATE
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#postalCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_POSTAL , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#postalCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_POSTAL , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#postalCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_POSTAL
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_NUM , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_NUM
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#locationNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_LOC_NUM , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#locationNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#locationNumber#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_LOC_NUM
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountClassification#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_ACT_CLS , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountClassification#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#accountClassification#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_ACT_CLS
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#customerGroup#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_CUSTGRP , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#customerGroup#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#customerGroup#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_CUSTGRP
, DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#sicCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD,NULL) AS TR_OPRD_TP_CD_SIC , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#sicCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_FROM_VAL_TXT_SIC , DECODE(TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD,#sicCode#,TR.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT,NULL) AS TR_THRU_VAL_TXT_SIC FROM TRTY_RULE TR , TRTY_RULE_TP TRP , DS_ORG_UNIT DOU , TRTY_TP TT WHERE TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TR.EFF_FROM_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (TR.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL OR TR.EFF_THRU_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD'))
AND TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD IN #trtyRuleTpList[]#
AND TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TR.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD = TRP.TRTY_RULE_TP_CD
AND TR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DOU.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DOU.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TR.ORG_CD = DOU.ORG_CD AND DOU.GNRN_TP_CD IN(#gnrnTpCurrent#, #gnrnTpFuture#)
AND DOU.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DOU.TRTY_TP_CD = TT.TRTY_TP_CD AND TT.DEF_SLS_REP_BAT_FLG = #defSlsRepBatFlg#
AND TR.TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD = #trtyRuleLogicTpCdAnd# ) GROUP BY ORG_CD

INSERT INTO
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN
(
SELECT #tableId# EZTABLEID , '0' EZCANCELFLAG , #ezintime# EZINTIME , #ezintimezone# EZINTIMEZONE , #ezincompanycode# EZINCOMPANYCODE , #ezinuserid# EZINUSERID , #ezinaplid# EZINAPLID , #ezuptime# EZUPTIME , #ezuptimezone# EZUPTIMEZONE , #ezupcompanycode# EZUPCOMPANYCODE , #ezupuserid# EZUPUSERID , #ezupaplid# EZUPAPLID , #glblCmpyCd# GLBL_CMPY_CD
, ACCT_CUST_PROS.TRTY_RULE_PK TRTY_RULE_PK , ACCT_CUST_PROS.DS_ACCT_NUM DS_ACCT_NUM , ACCT_CUST_PROS.LOC_NUM LOC_NUM , ACCT_CUST_PROS.DS_ACCT_NM DS_ACCT_NM , ACCT_CUST_PROS.DS_ACCT_TP_CD DS_ACCT_TP_CD , ACCT_CUST_PROS.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , ACCT_CUST_PROS.TRTY_TP_CD TRTY_TP_CD , ACCT_CUST_PROS.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , ACCT_CUST_PROS.ORG_RANK_NUM ORG_RANK_NUM , ACCT_CUST_PROS.ORG_CD ORG_CD , ACCT_CUST_PROS.PTY_LOC_PK PTY_LOC_PK
, ACCT_CUST_PROS.TRTY_BR_NM TRTY_BR_NM
FROM (SELECT
/*+ INDEX (PLW PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK_I7) NO_MERGE(TR) */
/*+ LEADING(TR TRL PLW) USE_NL(PLW) INDEX (PLW PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK_I5) NO_MERGE(TR) */
/*+ INDEX (DAC DS_ACCT_CLS_I1) NO_MERGE(TR) */
/*+ INDEX (DAGA DS_ACCT_GRP_ASG_I2) NO_MERGE(TR) */
/*+ INDEX (PLW PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK_I8) NO_MERGE(TR) */
/*+
LEADING(TR TRL PLW) USE_NL(PLW) INDEX(PLW PTY_LOC_WRK_I7) NO_MERGE(TR)
*/
/*+ NO_MERGE(TR) */
ACCT.DS_ACCT_NM DS_ACCT_NM , ACCT.DS_ACCT_TP_CD DS_ACCT_TP_CD , DAC.DS_ACCT_CLS_NM DS_ACCT_CLS_NM , PLW.DS_CUST_SIC_CD DS_CUST_SIC_CD
, ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD DS_ACCT_NUM , AL.LOC_NUM LOC_NUM , AL.PTY_LOC_PK PTY_LOC_PK
, ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM DS_ACCT_NUM , ACCT.LOC_NUM LOC_NUM , ACCT.PTY_LOC_PK PTY_LOC_PK
, PLW.FIRST_LINE_ADDR FIRST_LINE_ADDR , PLW.SCD_LINE_ADDR SCD_LINE_ADDR , PLW.THIRD_LINE_ADDR THIRD_LINE_ADDR , PLW.FRTH_LINE_ADDR FRTH_LINE_ADDR , PLW.CTY_ADDR CTY_ADDR , PLW.ST_CD ST_CD , PLW.PROV_NM PROV_NM , PLW.POST_CD POST_CD , CN.CNTY_NM CNTY_NM
, STC.SHIP_TO_CUST_CD SHIP_TO_CUST_CD , STC.BILL_TO_CUST_CD BILL_TO_CUST_CD
, PLW.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , TR.ORG_RANK_NUM ORG_RANK_NUM
, TRL.ORG_CD ORG_CD , TRL.TRTY_TP_CD TRTY_TP_CD , TRL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , TRL.TRTY_RULE_PK TRTY_RULE_PK
, SUBSTR(DOU.ORG_NM, 0, 3) TRTY_BR_NM
FROM
DS_ACCT_PROS ACCT , PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK PLW
SELL_TO_CUST ACCT , ACCT_LOC AL , PTY_LOC_WRK PLW
, SHIP_TO_CUST STC
, DS_ACCT_CLS DAC , CNTY CN
, DS_ORG_UNIT DOU
, ( SELECT MIN(ORG_RANK_NUM) AS ORG_RANK_NUM , ACCT_LOC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , TRTY_TP_CD FROM TRTY_TP_RANK WHERE EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# GROUP BY ACCT_LOC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD , TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , TRTY_TP_CD ) TR
,TRTY_RULE_WRK TRL
,TRTY_RULE_PROS_WRK TRL
,( SELECT #orgCd# AS ORG_CD , #trtyRulePk# AS TRTY_RULE_PK , '' AS TRTY_RULE_TP_CD , '' AS TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT , '' AS TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT , '' AS TRTY_RULE_OPRD_TP_CD , '' AS TRTY_RULE_LOGIC_TP_CD , #trtyGrpTpCd# AS TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , #trtyTpCd# AS TRTY_TP_CD FROM DUAL ) TRL
WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ACCT.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated# AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_ACTV_CUST_FLG = #activeFlag#
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PLW.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated#
AND AL.LOC_NUM = PLW.LOC_NUM
AND ACCT.LOC_NUM = PLW.LOC_NUM
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND DAC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD = DAC.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD(+)
AND PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CN.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PLW.CNTY_PK = CN.CNTY_PK(+)
AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM LOC_USG WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LOC_GRP_CD = #locGrpCd_Customer# AND PTY_LOC_PK = PLW.PTY_LOC_PK )
AND PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD (+) AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG (+) = '0' AND PLW.LOC_NUM = STC.LOC_NUM (+) AND STC.RGTN_STS_CD (+) <> #rgtnStsTerminated#
AND PLW.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD = TR.ACCT_LOC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD AND TRL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD = TR.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD AND TRL.TRTY_TP_CD = TR.TRTY_TP_CD
AND ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = AL.DS_ACCT_NUM AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND AL.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnStsActive#
AND ACCT.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated#
AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_ACTV_CUST_FLG = #activeFlag#
AND DOU.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) = #glblCmpyCd# AND DOU.ORG_CD(+) = TRL.ORG_CD AND DOU.GNRN_TP_CD(+) = #gnrnTpCd# AND DOU.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD(+) = #trtyGrpTpCdEss# AND DOU.ORG_STRU_TP_CD(+) = #orgStruTpCd# AND DOU.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0'
AND (
EXISTS ( SELECT DAGA.DS_ACCT_GRP_ASG_PK FROM DS_ACCT_GRP_ASG DAGA WHERE DAGA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DAGA.EFF_FROM_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND ( DAGA.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL OR DAGA.EFF_THRU_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') )
AND DAGA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = DAGA.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM = DAGA.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND
PLW.ST_CD
PLW.POST_CD
AL.DS_ACCT_NUM
ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM
DAC.DS_ACCT_CLS_CD
DAGA.DS_ACCT_GRP_CD
PLW.DS_CUST_SIC_CD
AL.LOC_NUM
ACCT.LOC_NUM
= TRL.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT
BETWEEN TRL.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT AND TRL.TRTY_RULE_THRU_VAL_TXT
)
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TRTY_CD_VAL_INFO TCVI , TRTY_CD_VAL_TP TCVT , TRTY_RULE TRL WHERE TCVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TCVT.OUT_BIZ_TRTY_FLG = 'Y' AND TCVT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TCVT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TCVI.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TCVT.TRTY_CD_VAL_TP_CD= TCVI.TRTY_CD_VAL_TP_CD AND TCVI.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TCVI.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TCVI.TRTY_ORG_CD = TRL.ORG_CD AND TRL.EFF_FROM_DT <= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AND (TRL.EFF_THRU_DT IS NULL OR TRL.EFF_THRU_DT >= TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#slsDt#, 'YYYYMMDD') + 1, 'YYYYMMDD')) AND TRL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TRL.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT = AL.LOC_NUM
AND TRL.TRTY_RULE_FROM_VAL_TXT = ACCT.LOC_NUM
)
AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TBL
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TBL
WHERE TBL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TBL.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = 'Y' AND TBL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND TBL.LOC_NUM = AL.LOC_NUM
AND TBL.LOC_NUM = ACCT.LOC_NUM
)
)
$conditionalExpression$
) ACCT_CUST_PROS )

TRUNCATE TABLE
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG_LOG
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG_LOG
ACCT_TRTY_RESRC_ASG
PROS_TRTY_RESRC_ASG
ACCT_TRTY_RESRC_LOG
PROS_TRTY_RESRC_LOG

DELETE FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TBL
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TBL
WHERE TBL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TBL.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = #manEntryFlg#

INSERT INTO

PROS_TRTY_RESRC_LOG

AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM DS_ORG_RESRC_RELN DORR WHERE DORR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DORR.ORG_CD = DOU.ORG_CD AND DORR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND DORR.ACCT_TEAM_ROLE_TP_CD IS NULL
AND DORR.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpCd# ) AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DAC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND DAC.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated# AND DAC.DS_ACCT_ACTV_CUST_FLG = #activeFlag#
AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND AL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND AL.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated# AND DAC.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = AL.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND TRLR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = AL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRLR.DS_ACCT_NUM = AL.DS_ACCT_NUM AND TRLR.LOC_NUM = AL.LOC_NUM
AND DAC.LOC_NUM = PLW.LOC_NUM AND TRLR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRLR.DS_ACCT_NUM = DAC.DS_ACCT_NUM AND TRLR.LOC_NUM = DAC.LOC_NUM
AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PLW.GLBL_CMPY_CD
AND DAC.LOC_NUM = PLW.LOC_NUM
AND PLW.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PLW.RGTN_STS_CD <> #rgtnStsTerminated#
AND AL.PTY_LOC_PK = PLW.PTY_LOC_PK
AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = CN.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND CN.EZCANCELFLAG(+)= '0' AND PLW.CNTY_PK = CN.CNTY_PK(+)
AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND STC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PLW.LOC_NUM = STC.LOC_NUM(+) AND STC.RGTN_STS_CD(+) <> #rgtnStsTerminated#
AND DAC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = BTC.GLBL_CMPY_CD(+) AND BTC.EZCANCELFLAG(+) = '0' AND PLW.LOC_NUM = BTC.LOC_NUM(+) AND BTC.RGTN_STS_CD(+) <> #rgtnStsTerminated# ORDER BY TRLR.DS_ACCT_NUM , TRLR.LOC_NUM , TRLR.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , TRLR.ORG_RANK_NUM ) TRLR_C ) RNK_SC
--2.LineBizTpCd ,( SELECT
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY LBL.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,LBL.DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,LBL.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM ORDER BY LBL.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD) AS ROW_NUM
ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY LBL.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,LBL.DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_TP_CD ORDER BY LBL.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD) AS ROW_NUM
,LBL.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,LBL.DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,LBL.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM ,LBL.TRTY_TP_CD
,LBL.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD ,LBL.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD ,LBT.LINE_BIZ_TP_CD FROM LINE_BIZ_ROLE_RANK_DECN LBL ,LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP LBT WHERE LBL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND LBL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND LBL.RNK_ELIG_FLG = #rnkEligFlg# AND LBL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LBT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LBL.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD = LBT.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD AND LBT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ORDER BY LBL.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD ,LBL.DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ,LBL.TRTY_TP_CD ,LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD ASC ) LBL_SC
--3.AcctGrp , AGA_SC AGA_SC_FIRST , AGA_SC AGA_SC_SCD , AGA_SC AGA_SC_THIRD , AGA_SC AGA_SC_FRTH , AGA_SC AGA_SC_FIFTH
--4.Location --6.isManual ,( SELECT DISTINCT ASG.DS_ACCT_TP_CD DS_ACCT_TP_CD ,ASG.LOC_NUM LOC_NUM ,ASG.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD ,ASG.ORG_CD ORG_CD FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
WHERE ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ASG.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = 'Y'
AND ASG.DS_ACCT_TP_CD = #dsAcctTp#
AND ASG.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD IN ( SELECT DECN.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD FROM LINE_BIZ_ROLE_RANK_DECN DECN WHERE DECN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DECN.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND DECN.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM IS NULL
) ) MU_SC WHERE
--2.LineBizTpCd RNK_SC.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD = LBL_SC.SRC_LINE_BIZ_TP_CD (+) AND RNK_SC.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD = LBL_SC.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD (+) AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_TP_CD = LBL_SC.DS_ACCT_TP_CD (+)
AND RNK_SC.ORG_RANK_NUM = LBL_SC.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM (+)
AND RNK_SC.TRTY_TP_CD = LBL_SC.TRTY_TP_CD (+)
AND LBL_SC.ROW_NUM (+) = 1
--3.AcctGrp AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM = AGA_SC_FIRST.DS_ACCT_NUM (+) AND AGA_SC_FIRST.ROW_NUM (+) = 1
AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM = AGA_SC_SCD.DS_ACCT_NUM (+) AND AGA_SC_SCD.ROW_NUM (+) = 2
AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM = AGA_SC_THIRD.DS_ACCT_NUM (+) AND AGA_SC_THIRD.ROW_NUM (+) = 3
AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM = AGA_SC_FRTH.DS_ACCT_NUM (+) AND AGA_SC_FRTH.ROW_NUM (+) = 4
AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM = AGA_SC_FIFTH.DS_ACCT_NUM (+) AND AGA_SC_FIFTH.ROW_NUM (+) = 5
--6.Manual AND RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_TP_CD = MU_SC.DS_ACCT_TP_CD (+) AND RNK_SC.LOC_NUM = MU_SC.LOC_NUM (+) AND RNK_SC.ORG_CD = MU_SC.ORG_CD (+) AND LBL_SC.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD = MU_SC.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+)
ORDER BY RNK_SC.DS_ACCT_NUM , RNK_SC.LOC_NUM , RNK_SC.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , RNK_SC.ORG_RANK_NUM ) MN_SC
--5.Resource ,( SELECT DORR.ORG_CD
, OFA.TOC_CD , OFA.PSN_CD FROM DS_ORG_RESRC_RELN DORR , ORG_STRU_TP OST , S21_PSN SP , ORG_FUNC_ASG OFA , TOC_ORG_STRU_RELN RELN , DS_ORG_UNIT UNIT
WHERE DORR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND DORR.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpCd#
AND DORR.ACCT_TEAM_ROLE_TP_CD IS NULL
AND DORR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OST.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DORR.ORG_STRU_TP_CD = OST.ORG_STRU_TP_CD AND OST.TRTY_STRU_FLG = #trtyStruFlg#
AND DORR.GLBL_CMPY_CD = SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND DORR.PSN_CD = SP.PSN_CD AND SP.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(SP.EFF_THRU_DT, #maxDt#) >= #slsDt#
AND SP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND SP.PSN_CD = OFA.PSN_CD AND OFA.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpCd#
AND OFA.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND OFA.TOC_CD = RELN.TOC_CD AND RELN.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(RELN.EFF_THRU_DT, #maxDt#) >= #slsDt#
AND RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = UNIT.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RELN.ORG_CD = UNIT.ORG_CD AND UNIT.FIRST_ORG_CD = #bizArea_Sales# AND UNIT.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTpCd#
AND DORR.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND SP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND OFA.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RELN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND UNIT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) RSC_SC
WHERE --5.Resource duplicate ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD and ORG_RANK_NUM 'X' after first Line is Non-target (MN_SC.LA_ROW_NUM = MN_SC.LA_RANK_NUM OR MN_SC.ORG_RANK_NUM != 'X') AND MN_SC.ORG_CD = RSC_SC.ORG_CD (+) ) MN
--6. Manual Active Resource ,( SELECT UNIT.ORG_CD ORG_CD
, PSN.PSN_CD PSN_CD , RQST.TOC_CD TOC_CD , UNIT.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD TRTY_GRP_TP_CD , UNIT.TRTY_TP_CD TRTY_TP_CD FROM DS_ORG_UNIT UNIT , DS_ORG_RESRC_RELN RELN , S21_PSN PSN , ORG_FUNC_ASG ASG , ORG_TOC_CHNG_RQST RQST WHERE UNIT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND UNIT.GNRN_TP_CD = #gnrnTp_Current# AND UNIT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND UNIT.ORG_CD = RELN.ORG_CD AND RELN.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(RELN.EFF_THRU_DT, #maxDt#) >= #slsDt#
AND RELN.ACCT_TEAM_ROLE_TP_CD IS NULL
AND RELN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RELN.PSN_CD = PSN.PSN_CD AND PSN.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(PSN.EFF_THRU_DT, #maxDt#) >= #slsDt# AND PSN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND PSN.PSN_CD = ASG.PSN_CD AND ASG.EFF_FROM_DT <= #slsDt# AND NVL(ASG.EFF_THRU_DT, #maxDt#) >= #slsDt# AND ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RQST.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ASG.TOC_CD = RQST.TOC_CD AND RQST.RGTN_STS_CD = #rgtnSts_P20# AND UNIT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RELN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND PSN.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ASG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND RQST.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AR_SC WHERE --6.Manual first Line MN.ROW_NUM_MU = 1 AND MN.ORG_CD_MU = AR_SC.ORG_CD (+)

INSERT INTO
ACCT_TRTY_RESRC_ASG
PROS_TRTY_RESRC_ASG
WITH LOC_SC AS ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY LOC_NUM ORDER BY DS_ACCT_NUM, LOC_NUM, ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD) ROW_NUM , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY DS_ACCT_NUM, LOC_NUM, ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD ORDER BY ORG_CD) ROW_NUM_ATTRB , LOC_NUM , DS_ACCT_NUM , DS_ACCT_NM , ORG_CD , MAN_ENTRY_FLG , ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD , LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD , TOC_CD , PSN_CD FROM ( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT
TRTY.DS_ACCT_NUM
, ACCT.DS_ACCT_NM
, TRTY.LOC_NUM
, TRTY.ORG_CD AS ORG_CD , TRTY.MAN_ENTRY_FLG AS MAN_ENTRY_FLG , TRTY.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD AS ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD , TRTY.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD AS LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD , CASE WHEN TRTY.ORG_RANK_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN TRTY.TOC_CD ELSE '' END AS TOC_CD , CASE WHEN TRTY.ORG_RANK_NUM IS NOT NULL THEN TRTY.PSN_CD ELSE '' END AS PSN_CD FROM
SELL_TO_CUST ACCT
DS_ACCT_PROS ACCT
, ACCT_LOC LOC , PTY_LOC_WRK PTY
, ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY
, PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK PTY
, PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY
WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_ACTV_CUST_FLG = #flgOnY#
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD
AND ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = LOC.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ACCT.LOC_NUM = PTY.LOC_NUM
AND LOC.RGTN_STS_CD != #rgtnSts_P99#
AND LOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LOC.PTY_LOC_PK = PTY.PTY_LOC_PK
AND PTY.RGTN_STS_CD != #rgtnSts_P99#
AND LOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LOC.DS_ACCT_NUM = TRTY.DS_ACCT_NUM AND LOC.LOC_NUM = TRTY.LOC_NUM
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM = TRTY.DS_ACCT_NUM AND ACCT.LOC_NUM = TRTY.LOC_NUM
AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND LOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PTY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TRTY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
UNION ALL
SELECT
LOC.DS_ACCT_NUM
ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM
, ACCT.DS_ACCT_NM
, LOC.LOC_NUM
, ACCT.LOC_NUM
, NULL AS ORG_CD , 'N' AS MAN_ENTRY_FLG , NULL AS ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD , NULL AS LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD , NULL AS TOC_CD , NULL AS PSN_CD FROM
SELL_TO_CUST ACCT
DS_ACCT_PROS ACCT
, ACCT_LOC LOC , PTY_LOC_WRK PTY
, PROS_PTY_LOC_WRK PTY
WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_ACTV_CUST_FLG = #flgOnY#
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = LOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD
AND ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = LOC.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ACCT.LOC_NUM = PTY.LOC_NUM
AND LOC.RGTN_STS_CD != #rgtnSts_P99#
AND LOC.GLBL_CMPY_CD = PTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND LOC.PTY_LOC_PK = PTY.PTY_LOC_PK
AND PTY.RGTN_STS_CD != #rgtnSts_P99# AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
WHERE ACCT.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD
AND ACCT.SELL_TO_CUST_CD = ASG.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND ACCT.DS_ACCT_NUM = ASG.DS_ACCT_NUM
AND LOC.LOC_NUM = ASG.LOC_NUM
AND ASG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) AND ACCT.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND LOC.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND PTY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) ORDER BY DS_ACCT_NUM , LOC_NUM , ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD ) )
( SELECT DISTINCT #tableId# EZTABLEID , '0' EZCANCELFLAG , #ezintime# EZINTIME , #ezintimezone# EZINTIMEZONE , #ezincompanycode# EZINCOMPANYCODE , #ezinuserid# EZINUSERID , #ezinaplid# EZINAPLID , #ezuptime# EZUPTIME , #ezuptimezone# EZUPTIMEZONE , #ezupcompanycode# EZUPCOMPANYCODE , #ezupuserid# EZUPUSERID , #ezupaplid# EZUPAPLID , #glblCmpyCd# GLBL_CMPY_CD
, LOC_M.DS_ACCT_NUM DS_ACCT_NUM , LOC_M.DS_ACCT_NM DS_ACCT_NM , LOC_M.LOC_NUM LOC_NUM , #dsAcctTp# DS_ACCT_TP_CD
, LOC_1.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_01 , LOC_1.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_01 , LOC_1.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_01 , LOC_2.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_02 , LOC_2.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_02 , LOC_2.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_02 , LOC_3.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_03 , LOC_3.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_03 , LOC_3.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_03 , LOC_4.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_04 , LOC_4.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_04 , LOC_4.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_04 , LOC_5.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_05 , LOC_5.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_05 , LOC_5.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_05 , LOC_6.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_06 , LOC_6.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_06 , LOC_6.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_06 , LOC_7.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_07 , LOC_7.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_07 , LOC_7.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_07 , LOC_8.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_08 , LOC_8.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_08 , LOC_8.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_08 , LOC_9.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_09 , LOC_9.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_09 , LOC_9.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_09 , LOC_10.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_10 , LOC_10.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_10 , LOC_10.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_10
, LOC_11.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_11 , LOC_11.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_11 , LOC_11.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_11 , LOC_12.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_12 , LOC_12.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_12 , LOC_12.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_12 , LOC_13.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_13 , LOC_13.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_13 , LOC_13.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_13 , LOC_14.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_14 , LOC_14.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_14 , LOC_14.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_14 , LOC_15.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_15 , LOC_15.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_15 , LOC_15.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_15 , LOC_16.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_16 , LOC_16.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_16 , LOC_16.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_16 , LOC_17.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_17 , LOC_17.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_17 , LOC_17.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_17 , LOC_18.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_18 , LOC_18.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_18 , LOC_18.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_18 , LOC_19.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_19 , LOC_19.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_19 , LOC_19.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_19 , LOC_20.ORG_CD ACCT_TRTY_ORG_CD_20 , LOC_20.PSN_CD ACCT_TRTY_PSN_CD_20 , LOC_20.TOC_CD ACCT_TRTY_TOC_CD_20
, LOC_1.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_01 , LOC_2.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_02 , LOC_3.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_03 , LOC_4.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_04 , LOC_5.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_05 , LOC_6.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_06 , LOC_7.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_07 , LOC_8.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_08 , LOC_9.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_09 , LOC_10.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_10
, LOC_11.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_11 , LOC_12.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_12 , LOC_13.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_13 , LOC_14.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_14 , LOC_15.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_15 , LOC_16.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_16 , LOC_17.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_17 , LOC_18.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_18 , LOC_19.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_19 , LOC_20.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD_20
, LOC_M.MAN_ENTRY_FLG MAN_ENTRY_FLG
FROM LOC_SC LOC_M ,LOC_SC LOC_1 ,LOC_SC LOC_2 ,LOC_SC LOC_3 ,LOC_SC LOC_4 ,LOC_SC LOC_5 ,LOC_SC LOC_6 ,LOC_SC LOC_7 ,LOC_SC LOC_8 ,LOC_SC LOC_9 ,LOC_SC LOC_10 ,LOC_SC LOC_11 ,LOC_SC LOC_12 ,LOC_SC LOC_13 ,LOC_SC LOC_14 ,LOC_SC LOC_15 ,LOC_SC LOC_16 ,LOC_SC LOC_17 ,LOC_SC LOC_18 ,LOC_SC LOC_19 ,LOC_SC LOC_20 WHERE LOC_M.ROW_NUM = 1 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_1.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_1.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 1 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_2.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_2.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 2 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_3.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_3.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 3 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_4.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_4.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 4 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_5.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_5.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 5 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_6.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_6.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 6 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_7.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_7.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 7 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_8.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_8.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 8 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_9.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_9.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 9 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_10.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_10.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 10
AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_11.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_11.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 11 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_12.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_12.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 12 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_13.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_13.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 13 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_14.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_14.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 14 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_15.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_15.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 15 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_16.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_16.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 16 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_17.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_17.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 17 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_18.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_18.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 18 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_19.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_19.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 19 AND LOC_M.LOC_NUM = LOC_20.LOC_NUM (+) AND LOC_20.ASG_TRTY_ATTRB_CD (+) = 20
AND LOC_1.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_2.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_3.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_4.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_5.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_6.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_7.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_8.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_9.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_10.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_11.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_12.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_13.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_14.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_15.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_16.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_17.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_18.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_19.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 AND LOC_20.ROW_NUM_ATTRB (+) = 1 )

UPDATE
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASL
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASL
SET EZCANCELFLAG = '1' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG ASG
WHERE ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND ASG.MAN_ENTRY_FLG = 'Y' AND ASG.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND ASG.DS_ACCT_TP_CD = #dsAcctTp#
AND ASG.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD IN ( SELECT DECN.LINE_BIZ_ROLE_TP_CD FROM LINE_BIZ_ROLE_RANK_DECN DECN WHERE DECN.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd#
AND DECN.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM IS NOT NULL
AND DECN.LINE_BIZ_RANK_NUM IS NULL
)
AND ASG.GLBL_CMPY_CD = ASL.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND ASG.ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG_PK = ASL.ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG_PK ) AND ASL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

DELETE FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG
WHERE GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND EZCANCELFLAG = '1'

DELETE FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY
WHERE TRTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TRTY.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM
ACCT_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY2
PROS_TRTY_ROLE_ASG TRTY2
WHERE TRTY.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TRTY2.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TRTY.EZCANCELFLAG = TRTY2.EZCANCELFLAG AND TRTY.LOC_NUM = TRTY2.LOC_NUM AND TRTY2.ORG_RANK_NUM = #rankNumX# AND TRTY.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD = TRTY2.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD ) AND TRTY.ORG_RANK_NUM <> #rankNumX#

UPDATE
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN RN
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN RN
SET EZCANCELFLAG = '1' WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN RN1
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN RN1
,TRTY_TP TP1 ,(SELECT DISTINCT RN2.TRTY_BR_NM ,RN2.TRTY_TP_CD
,RN2.LOC_NUM
,TP.GEO_TRTY_FLG FROM
TRTY_RULE_LOC_RELN RN2
TRTY_RULE_PROS_RELN RN2
,TRTY_TP TP WHERE RN2.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND RN2.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD = #trtyGrpTpCdEss# AND RN2.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND TP.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RN2.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND TP.TRTY_TP_CD = RN2.TRTY_TP_CD AND TP.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' ) BR_TBL WHERE TP1.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND TP1.GEO_TRTY_FLG = 'Y' AND TP1.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND RN1.GLBL_CMPY_CD = TP1.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RN1.TRTY_TP_CD = TP1.TRTY_TP_CD AND RN1.TRTY_GRP_TP_CD = #trtyGrpTpCdEss# AND RN1.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
AND BR_TBL.TRTY_BR_NM = RN1.TRTY_BR_NM AND BR_TBL.GEO_TRTY_FLG = 'N'
AND BR_TBL.LOC_NUM = RN1.LOC_NUM
AND RN1.GLBL_CMPY_CD = RN.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND RN1.TRTY_RULE_PK = RN.TRTY_RULE_PK AND RN1.DS_ACCT_NUM = RN.DS_ACCT_NUM AND RN1.LOC_NUM = RN.LOC_NUM )
